Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near State/58th
ShortDescription: 29 State buses temp. rerouted NB: State, 59th, Wentworth, 55th, & State; SB: State, 55th, Wells, 59th, & State, due to street blockage near State/58th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/58th, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via State, 59th, Wentworth, 55th, & State.

Southbound buses will operate via State, 55th, Wells, 59th, & State.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Ashland/92nd
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 87th, & Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/92nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 87th, & Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/92nd.

Allow extra travel time.
